data.name: Child
data.description: A sub-activity (sub-component) of a larger activity (the parent)

data.name: Sibling
data.description: A sub-activity (sub-component) related to another sub-activity of the same parent

data.name: Multifunded
data.description: A multifunded, or co-funded activity. The identifier should be globally unique and shared by all reporters of this activity.
